javadoc:
A convenience base class that combines the {@link GTableCellRenderer} with the {@link GColumnRenderer} interface.

Table columns that wish to provider a renderer will have to implement the {@link GColumnRenderer} interface. Rather then implement that interface and extend the {@link GTableCellRenderer}, clients can simply extends this class. @param the column type
name: AbstractGColumnRenderer
comment:
A convenience base class that combines the GTableCellRenderer with the 
 GColumnRenderer interface.
 
 Table columns that wish to provider a renderer will have to implement the 
 GColumnRenderer interface.  Rather then implement that interface and extend
 the GTableCellRenderer, clients can simply extends this class.
